section.p: Advance Directives Observatations assert findings (e.g., "resuscitation status is Full Code") rather than orders, and should not be considered legal documents. A legal document can be referenced using the reference/externalReference construct.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8648)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8649)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8654)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2 Advance Directive Type Code STATIC 1 (CONF:8651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8652)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8656)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] participant (CONF:8662)
Such participants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="VRF" (CONF:8663)
Such participants SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8665)
Such participants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole, where its type is CDA Participant Role (CONF:8666)

SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:8667)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CST" (CONF:8668)
This participant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole (CONF:8669)
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ROL" (CONF:8670)
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:8671)
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] telecom (CONF:8672)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity (ii., CONF:8824)
This playingEntity SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8673)
This playingEntity The name of the agent who can provide a copy of the Advance Directive SHALL be recorded in the <name> element inside the <playingEntity> element (CONF:8674)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] reference (CONF:8692)
Such references SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="REFR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType)
Such references SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument (CONF:8693)
This externalDocument SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8695)
This externalDocument MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:8696)
This externalDocument The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @mediaType (CONF:8703)
This externalDocument The text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference. a. The URL of a referenced advance directive document MAY be present, and SHALL be represented in Observation/reference/ExternalDocument/text/reference. b. If a URL is referenced, then it SHOULD have a corresponding linkHTML element in narrative block. (CONF:8697, CONF:8698, CONF:8699)
This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low i. If the starting time is unknown, the <low> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to UNK (CONF:8657, CONF:8658)

This effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high. i. If the ending time is unknown, the <high> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to UNK. ii. If the Advance Directive does not have a specified ending time, the <high> element SHALL have the nullFlavor attribute set to NA. (CONF:8659, CONF:8660)
